Package app.util

Class AbstractConstant

java.lang.Object
app.util.AbstractConstant
Direct Known Subclasses:
CurrentNodeType, JwtClaims, LogType, Period, PropName, Provider, ReqParam, SecretLength, SecureParam, Status
public abstract class AbstractConstant
extends java.lang.Object
A storage for constants

Must be extended by a class, containing constants. Children classes must have a final modifier.

Every constant must by initialised in this way:

public final static [String/int] [NAME IN UPPER CASE] = [value]

Call to the constants looks like:

AbstractConstant's child.[CONSTANT_NAME]

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected AbstractConstant()
    Protected constructor for locking constants class from creating its object.
